ReadMEIRequest

public ReadMEIRequest()
Constructs a new Read MEI Data request instance.

ReadMEIRequest

public ReadMEIRequest(int level,
                      int id)
Constructs a new Read MEI Data request instance with a given reference and count of coils (i.e. bits) to be read.

Parameters:
ref - the reference number of the register to read from.
count - the number of bits to be read.
Method Detail

getResponse

public ModbusResponse getResponse()
Description copied from class: ModbusRequest
Returns the ModbusResponse that correlates with this ModbusRequest.

The response must include the unit number, function code, as well as any transport-specific header information.

This method is used to create an empty response which must be populated by the caller. It is commonly used to un-marshal responses from Modbus slaves.

Specified by:
getResponse in class ModbusRequest
Returns:
the corresponding ModbusResponse.

createResponse

public ModbusResponse createResponse()
The ModbusCoupler interface doesn't have a method for defining MEI for a device.

Specified by:
createResponse in class ModbusRequest
Returns:
the corresponding ModbusResponse.
